0: assert zombie_shootout(10, 5, 5) == "You shot 5 zombies before being eaten: overwhelmed."

assert zombie_shootout(5, 5, 0) == "You shot 0 zombies before being eaten: ran out of ammo."
assert zombie_shootout(10, 20, 5) == "You shot 5 zombies before being eaten: ran out of ammo."
assert zombie_shootout(10, 5, 10) == "You shot 10 zombies before being eaten: overwhelmed."
1: assert zombie_shootout(15, 20, 15) == "You shot 15 zombies before being eaten: overwhelmed."

2: assert zombie_shootout(15, 0, 10) == "You shot 0 zombies before being eaten: overwhelmed."

3: assert zombie_shootout(10, 15, 8) == "You shot 8 zombies before being eaten: ran out of ammo."
